attributes.action: Share our vaccines with other countries
attributes.additional_details:
COVID is a global pandemic, and the nightmare will only be stopped when it eliminated globally.

We have a proud record of helping other countries, both through official aid, and through individual charitable donations.

It is in the interest of our own public health, and in keeping with our best national values, to share the vaccines we do not need.
attributes.background:
The UK government has successfully secured 360m doses of COVID vaccines.

For a nation of 70m people, we are in the fortunate position of have more than we need.

We should share our excess supplies with other countries, who are not so fortunate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase funding to make Covid-19 vaccines available to developing countries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550900

Donate surplus Covid-19 vaccine doses to poorer countries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565462
